creator: pr@webapp.de
text:
only can compile jakarta-tomcat-connector with
the lastet jakarta-tomcat-4.0 checkout

Apache 1.3.22
Suse Linux 7.3
jdk 1.3.1
ant 1.4.1

./support/buildconf.sh
./configure --with-apxs=/usr/local/apache/bin/apxs --enable-java 
--with-tomcat=../../jakarta-tomcat-4.0/dist
make
make java-build

no automatic build java package and got some errors with
DefaultServerSocketFactory or ServerSocketFactory!

Fixed (ported the change from the Tomcat 4 CVS). Webapp should now build fine 
against the CVS HEAD and the 4.0 branch.
creator: remm@apache.org
